description:
Fallout 4 has been updated for PS5, Xbox Series X, and even PC. How is Fallout 4 in 2024? Let's talk.
Stellar Blade (PS5) is a big new action game from a relatively unknown development studio. How is it? Let's talk.
Subscribe for more: http://youtube.com/gameranxtv ▼



Watch more 'Before You Buy': https://bit.ly/2kfdxI6
title: Fallout 4 (Next Gen) - Before You Buy
